useful_title: The Science and Psychology of Music
best_gem_comment: Super light workload and super sweet/passionate course staff! A little disorganized at times (instructions on assignments were unclear) but the content was pretty interesting. Mayron and Deborah were so sweet and supportive, and genuinely care about their students. Would recommend if you're looking for a gem! I bet this class will be even better next year since this was the first semester it was offered.
best_gem_comment_short: Would recommend if you're looking for a gem!

useful_title: Family, School, and Society: Shaping the Developing Child
best_gem_comment: Great class. A gem for sure. All of the assignments were feasible and relative to course content. You always get good feedback, and discussions were interesting. A lot of flexibility and independence in terms of assignment deadlines, and every assignment was straightforward.

useful_title: Introduction to Statistics for the Behavioral Sciences
best_gem_comment: This class is a GEM, it's a very light workload and an amazing alternative to stat110/102/104. The teaching staff genuinely wants you to do well and get an A. The material is presented clearly and there's a lot of support. It's a good introduction to R if you're looking to start coding!
best_gem_comment_short: This class is a GEM, it's a very light workload and an amazing alternative to stat110/102/104.

best_gem_comment: This class is super interesting! You get to learn a lot about cool research related to children and it really gives you a lot of insight/ perspective on childhood. The lectures and really well done, and the class is easy and not that much work. Definitely a gem!
